p: For cellulose carbohydrate molecule, Nakayama and Imai [ 45] found that US pretreatment (20 kHz, 200 W, 10 min) can enhance the enzymatic hydrolysis of kenaf herb ( Hibiscus cannabinus) cellulose to produce glucose sugar. In which, the authors reported that US induced a higher association of cellulase and cellulose by removing the covering materials on the kenaf cellulose, as could be seen in Fig. 5.
